title: 39k02 - Covered employers with no FMLA-eligible employees.
text:
Covered employers
with no eligible employees need only maintain the basic payroll and identifying
employee data (see FOH 39k01(a)(1)). 29 CFR 825.500(d)
html:
Covered employers with no eligible employees need only maintain the basic payroll and identifying employee data (see FOH 39k01(a)(1)).

 

29 CFR 825.500(d)
